name: Shitty Hero
description:
Welcome Shitty Hero!

This is a parody game about a hero with a special ability, the Nuke-Fart!
your mission is to ravage a village and eat as much food as you can to release your Nuke-Fart on the demon world!

Tileset by Gif
Icons by Azuna Pixels
Music by Teknoaxe
Developed by ElvGames
